q: decision taken by the International Committee of Museums( ICOM) to establish an international supervision committee to oversee and monitor the Egyptian Museum in an attempt to protect it following the recent attempt to loot it. We don't need any international supervision. The Egyptian Museum and all archaeological sites in Egypt are under the protection of the army and honest Egyptian people, Zahi Hawass insisted. I'm still hearing those grumblings today. " Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded John McCain Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. "All sorts of nastiness. Republican U.S. Dick Armey Mike Pence made the rounds at the Indiana Statehouse on Tuesday. office, delivered a speech in both the Indiana House and Senate chambers, and then spoke with news media. I would say our options we're considering and we're reflecting on are to either continue to serve in Washington in some capacity, to come home to Indiana to seek higher office or to seek higher office on the national level, Mike Pence told reporters. Indiana Republicans have said in recent weeks that they believe Mike Pence will run for governor, in part because the office could serve as a better springboard for a national campaign than a U.S.

" Page will take over Eric Schmidt 's job on April 4. Eric Schmidt will become the company's executive chairman, working on Google's relationships with other companies. Sergey Brin ( a University of Maryland alumnus) will devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the post explained. It's impossible to tell how Eric Schmidt 's unexpected departure-- which also led off better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings-- will affect Google's services and products. But one thing's for sure
